title: Sidharth Malhotra and Katrina Kaif party hard in Glasgow
text:
Bollywood actors Sidharth Malhotra and Katrina Kaif, who will romance each other on screen for the first time in 'Baar Baar Dekho', have completed the first schedule of their film in Glasgow, Scotland. The duo, along with first-time director Nitya Mehra and crew, celebrated the wrap by partying hard in the city.
  A photo posted by Sidharth Malhotra (@s1dofficial) onOct 7, 2015 at 6:30pm PDT
 
Sidharth took to social media to share a photo from their celebrations. He captioned the picture, "It's a wrap on #glasgow schedule super memories n now party #shoot #outdoor #party #crew #katrinakaif."
Also see:  Sidharth Malhotra pouts - and how! 
Sidharth, who had gained weight for his film 'Brothers', looks lean and sports a clean-shaven look for his lover-boy role in 'Baar Baar Dekho'.

'Baar Baar Dekho' is a timeless love story that revolves around the journey of a couple across different age groups.
